nodes.name: Get a response from knowledge base

parameters.initialMessages: What would you like to know?

parameters.content:
## 3. Show response to the user

The response obtained using InfraNodus GraphRAG is then shown to the user.

## 2. Query the Knowledge Base

Use the [InfraNodus GraphRAG node](https://n8n.io/integrations/infranodus-graph-rag/) to generate an answer to your query. No need to add vector store or additional model connectors.

To set up, you need to provide:
- Your [InfraNodus API key](https://infranodus.com/api-access)
- The name of the graph you'll query. Learn how to [create the graph in InfraNodus](.

Read more about [GraphRAG](https://infranodus.com/docs/graph-rag-knowledge-graph)

## 1. AI Chat Trigger

Use the n8n built-in chat for testing and then replace this node with a Webhook node and expose to your users via the embeddable [n8n Chat Widget](https://n8n-chat-widget.com).

## Basic AI Chatbot Tutorial

- No vector store needed
- Uses GraphRAG and custom ontology for responses

### Learn how to set up a simple AI chatbot without vector store and complex AI agent setups in this [support article](https://support.noduslabs.com/hc/en-us/articles/24079266183196-Building-Expert-Ontology-for-InfraNodus-GraphRAG-n8n-Expert-Node) and this video tutorial: 

[![Video tutorial](https://img.youtube.com/vi/qP4KTLBzoWQ/sddefault.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qP4KTLBzoWQ)
